situation.title: Alcohol and substance use
situation.meta_description: Increased stress can lead to increased use of alcohol and other substances.

content.processed:
Recommendations

Increased stress can lead to increased use of alcohol and other substances. If you or someone you care about is consuming alcohol or other substances or increasing their use, contact professionals.

For a list of crisis lines, see Stress and the effects of a pandemic> Psychological help.
